name: Pass The Parcel (itch)
description:
Classic party games like "pass the parcel" and "musical chairs" require music to stop suddenly and at unexpected intervals. Remove the human element (and free up an additional player!) with this handy dandy app!

Press "Play" to start the music.
When the music stops, hit the big red button to start it playing again.

Custom music can be loaded by setting the path to a folder filled with MP3, Ogg and WAV files.
